string.value: Ryden says that he has a new mission for you. Go to Kerning City and meet with Ryden.

Ryden says that the poster and bomb incident has awakened the Dark Lord to the threat of the Dual Blades. Their full identities might be compromised if they stay in Kerning City much longer. Since it is time for them to make a quick exit, he asks that you recover the #b#t4032622:##k which was hidden purposefully. \r\nComplete Destruction of Evidence...\r\n

Ryden said that the poster and bomb incident had awakened the Dark Lord to the threat of the Dual Blades. Their full identities would've been compromised if they stayed in Kerning City much longer. Since it was time for them to make a quick exit, he took back the Dual Blade Seal that had been attached to a #o1120100#.

string.name: summary
string.value: Defeat #bOctopuses#k in places like #bCaution Falling Down, Construction Site North of Kerning City, Northern Top of Construction Site, etc.#k and recover the #b#t4032622:##k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 2,500\r\nCan proceed to 'Sixth Mission: Destroying the Evidence 2' quest.\r\n

All of Kerning City is in disarray due to the poster and bomb incident. If he ever doubted before, the Dark Lord is now certain of our existence. We'll be found out if we stay here much longer. We've received orders to leave Kerning City, but there is one more thing we have to do first. Are you up to it?
We placed Dual Blade Seals in various monsters to create abnormal behaviors in them. But before we leave, we need to eliminate these monsters and recover the seals so that no evidence will be left.

First, eliminate the #b#o1120100#es#k and recover #b5 #t4032622#s#k. You can find Octopuses in places like the Kerning City Construction Site, the Construction Site North of Kerning City, and the Northern Top of Construction Site. There's not much time so hurry!
Are you nervous? Your nerves are only going to get in the way of this mission.
You've gotten quite fast. Hurry, give me the seals.
This isn't the end of it. There are still more seals that you need to recover.
You haven't recovered the seals yet. There's not much time left, so hurry!
